title: If an Imam has done Tayammum can he lead the prayer? - Assim al hakeem
transcript: and also if the Imam is perform has performed TM mu either because he is unable to use water due to an illness or due to lack of water but behind him the followers are all on Moodle with water so is he of a lesser degree and we say to him well because you did say a mom you have to retreat and let someone else lead the salat no there is no problem in that none whatsoever
